course.title: Discrete Structures
course.catalogDescription: This course is a study of mathematical reasoning including the nature and methods of proof, relations and functions, combinatorics and graph theory, Boolean algebra, and applications of these topics. Attention will be given to the direct applications to computer science. cription

objectives.objective: The goal of this course is to provide students with skills and experience in the following areas of (1) formal logic, (2) counting, (3)functions and (4) induction and recurrence.
